___ip.description: In Point of layer. Sets the initial frame of the layer.
___ip.title: In Point

___ind.description: Layer index in AE. Used for parenting and expressions.
___ind.title: Index

___ln.description: Parsed layer name used as html id on SVG/HTML renderer
___ln.title: layer HTML ID

___parent.description: Layer Parent. Uses ind of parent.
___parent.title: Parent

___op.description: Out Point of layer. Sets the final frame of the layer.
___op.title: Out Point

___st.description: Start Time of layer. Sets the start time of the layer.
___st.title: Start Time

___sc.description: Color of the solid in hex
___sc.title: Solid Color

___cl.description: Parsed layer name used as html class on SVG/HTML renderer
___cl.title: Class

___nm.description: After Effects Layer Name. Used for expressions.
___nm.title: Name

___hasMask.description: Boolean when layer has a mask. Will be deprecated in favor of checking masksProperties.
___hasMask.title: Has Masks
